name: Crumble Keep
description:
The cannons are out for your gold blocks! Drop brick blocks to protect your gold against the dastardly attacks. How long can you survive?

Use A and D keys to maneuver blocks left or right, use S to drop the block faster but if you drop the blocks too fast they might get damaged!

ESC to pause

After dropping the brick blocks you will need to place a gold block. If you lose too many gold blocks during the attack phase you will lose the game!
